content.name: Crystal Cooldown Remover
content.description:
Removes cooldowns for crystal mining, which were added in a previous game version to reduce the profits from mining crystals.
Save compatible.
content.author: draeath

text.name: Crystal Cooldown Remover
text.description:
Removes cooldowns for crystal mining, which were added in a previous game version to reduce the profits from mining crystals.
Save compatible.
text.author: draeath

text.name: Kristall-Cooldown-Entferner
text.description:
Entfernt Abklingzeiten für den Kristallabbau, die in einer früheren Spielversion hinzugefügt wurden, um die Gewinne aus dem Abbau von Kristallen zu verringern.
Kompatibel speichern.
text.author: draeath
